name: rfid_workstation
description: This STIG contains the technical security controls for the operation of a RFID Workstation in the DoD environment.
title: RFID Workstation Security Technical Implementation Guide (STIG)

items.title: If a wireless connection (e.g. WLAN, Bluetooth) is used between the RFID scanner and RFID workstation, security requirements must be followed.
items.description: Sensitive data stored on the RFID scanner and transmitted to the workstation could be compromised.

items.title: PDA and Smartphones that are connected to DoD Windows computers via a USB connection must be compliant with requirements.
items.description: PDAs with flash memory can introduce malware to a PC when they are connected for provisioning of the PDA or to transfer data between the PC and PDA, particularly if the PDA is seen by the PC as a mass storage device and autorun in enabled.
